title: French Gourmet with Justine Schofield
overview: Embark on a culinary adventure through Southern France with renowned cook Justine Scholfield in 'French Gourmet.' Viewers are immersed in the rich aromas of French cuisine as Justine explores the canals of Burgundy on a magical barge journey. From historical towns to encounters with artisanal producers, 'French Gourmet' captures the essence of local markets and the delectable offerings of charming restaurants. Join Justine in celebrating the timeless allure of French cuisine and experience the magic of Southern France.
